description: Distributed tracing dashboard powered by Tempo span-metrics and service-graph metrics. RED method derived from traces, service topology, and trace search.

panels.description: Live service dependency graph built from trace data. Nodes are services, edges represent calls between them.
panels.title: Service Map (from Traces)

panels.description: Request rate per service derived from Tempo span-metrics. Unlike Prometheus scrape metrics, these come directly from traces.
panels.title: Request Rate by Service (from Traces)

panels.description: Error rate per service from trace span status codes

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (service) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by (service) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])), 0.001)

panels.title: Error Rate by Service (from Traces) %

panels.description: Latency percentiles per service derived from trace span durations
panels.title: Latency Percentiles by Service (from Traces)

panels.description: Top 10 operations by request rate across all services
panels.title: Top 10 Operations by Rate

panels.description: Top 10 slowest operations by p95 latency from trace spans

targets.expr: topk(10, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (service, span_name, le) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]))))

panels.title: Top 10 Slowest Operations (p95)

panels.description: Operations with the highest error rate from trace span status codes

targets.expr: topk(10, 100 * sum by (service, span_name) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by (service, span_name) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])), 0.001))

panels.title: Top 10 Highest Error Operations %

panels.description: Rate of spans by span_kind showing the ratio of server, client, internal, producer, and consumer spans
panels.title: Span Throughput by Kind (Server/Client/Producer/Consumer)

panels.description: Request rate between services derived from Tempo service-graph metrics
panels.title: Service-to-Service Request Rate

panels.description: Error rate for each service-to-service edge from Tempo service-graph

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (client, server) (rate(traces_service_graph_request_failed_total[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by (client, server) (rate(traces_service_graph_request_total[$__rate_interval])), 0.001)

panels.title: Service-to-Service Error Rate %

panels.description: Server-side p95 latency for each service-to-service edge
panels.title: Service-to-Service Latency p50/p95 (Server Side)

panels.description: Rate of producer vs consumer spans — shows async messaging throughput derived from traces. MassTransit publishes produce spans; consumers create consumer spans.
panels.title: Message Publish vs Consume Rate (from Traces)

panels.description: p95 latency for consumer spans — measures async message processing time per service from trace data
panels.title: Message Consumer Latency p50/p95 (from Traces)

panels.description: Client-side span rate for database calls (EF Core, HTTP clients). Shows how often each service calls external dependencies.
panels.title: External Dependency Call Rate (Client Spans)

panels.description: Client-side p95 latency — measures how long database queries, HTTP calls, and other external dependencies take per service

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (service, span_name, le) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: External Dependency Latency p95 (Client Spans)
Trace Search (TraceQL)

title: 5 - Distributed Tracing (Tempo)
